Articles.Content: What music inspires you to play? I feel this urge to play everytime I hear Royal Republic - Everbody Wants To Be An (kerbo)Astronaut
Ummmm let's see, there's The Launch by James Horner, Fly me to the Moon by Frank Sinatra, Final Countdown by Europe (An oldie but a goodie!) and for some strange reason Ring of Fire by Johnny Cash...

Breathe (In the air).

The instrumental in the beginning makes me think of a planet montage...

I could tell you the music I listen too while playing ksp. As far as music that makes me want to play? ... There isn't any in particular. I get motivation from either reading or watching something related. Like a documentary or... A certain Manga. Space Brothers. I'm in love with it. That gets me playing all night.

Or even something as simple as watching a rocket launch. The sound of the engines is all it takes to get me wanting to play. Music to my ears.
Rocket Man - Elton John. We all know it's a metaphor, but I choose to interpret it literally... and then wanna play KSP and go to Duna.

Please try to see if there are less ancient posts relevant to the topic before writing in a, quite frankly, mummified thread.

Here's one.

Thread locked.
